content: the gifting hat and scarf by jocelyn frasier version 2 1 this set is the perfect gift to knit for anyone whether it s for your female co-worker or your grandfather even picky people will love these it s oh-so-cozy and warm unisex sturdy and it s just perfect anyone would love to receive this to keep them warm in cold weather pattern overview this scarf and hat are knit in garter stitch with slipped stitches the hat is worked crown to brim the scarf is worked lengthwise with a stretchy selvedge the pattern shows the same on both right side and wrong side of garments sizing scarf finished size 7 8 in / 19 5 cm width and 5 5 ft / 1 6 m length hat finished circumference 18 21 24 in / 45 7 53 61 cm choose a size that has about 2 in / 5 cm of negative ease gauge 2 5mm us #1 5 34 knit st s stitch es k2tog knit two sts together wyib with yarn in back m1rp make one right purl wyif with yarn in front p purl yo yarn over 2 special stitch instructions ez sewn bind off cut yarn leaving a long tail attach to tapestry needle step 1 insert needle purl-wise into next two sts step 2 insert needle knit-wise into the first st and slip off repeat steps until one st remains insert needle purlwise into last st and slip off magic_ring cast on step 1 create a small circle with your yarn keep the tail to the right and on top of the circle step 2 take your needle and insert it into the circle from back to front keep the yarn tail on top of the circle and behind the needle pinch the yarn loop tight around the needle step 3 yarn over step 4 insert needle into loop and bring up a stitch repeat steps 3 & 4 until you have the correct number of stitches carefully continue in the round and place a bor marker share your #giftingscarf and #giftinghat to instagram and tag me
